
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_flatc_bin
  TOOL_flatc_dependency
  contrib/tools/flatc
  flatc
)

add_library(idl-pool-flat)


target_link_libraries(idl-pool-flat PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-flatbuffers
)

target_sources(idl-pool-flat PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/catboost/idl/pool/flat/quantized_chunk_t.fbs.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/catboost/idl/pool/flat/quantized_chunk_t.iter.fbs.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/catboost/idl/pool/flat/quantized_chunk_t.bfbs
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/catboost/idl/pool/flat/quantized_chunk_t.fbs.cpp
)



target_fbs_source(idl-pool-flat
  PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/idl/pool/flat/quantized_chunk_t.fbs
  -I
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  -I
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
)
